## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                                                     | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`    | Sets the related tab name, this name must match a `pds-tab`'s tab name property | `string` | `undefined` |
